name: Exploding Chicks
description:
Exploding Chicks is a game made in 4 evenings for the WeeklyGameJam#216.

The knights are coming for you! Quick! Use your mind-control powers and turn the knights into zombies to fight for you. 

Press "Space" to mind-control the knights within your ability radius, and watch the whole world burn. 

Programming by Tan Kang Soon , Art by Lois Chng

"Vicious" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
